SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc03
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.view.gui

Class Gui

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.view.ui.UI
it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.view.gui.Gui
public class Gui extends UI
The Gui class represents the graphical user interface for the game, extending the abstract UI class and implementing its methods.
